Room.Name: Field of Foxglove
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a field of wild foxglove, which is in full bloom.
Room.LongDescription: For a reason unknown to most people, the faerie folk are very fond of the foxglove blossom. This field must certainly be attractive to them, for the riotous color, if nothing else. This is the second level of the Hanging Gardens. The first level is to the west, and a beautiful tower forms the third level to the east.
